title: Popular Retro font?
content:
Looking for the name of this font or one similar to it. I really like it alot but I have not been able to find the font itself. Please help. Thanks!!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 5.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201150602/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%205_5.jpg) | 56.47 KB |

 [‹ (x) "Writing Early American History" historical calligraphic script - P22 Cezanne {Jan E}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201150602/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48951 "Go to previous forum topic") [whats this? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201150602/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48948 "Go to next forum topic")
author: a.zuccs

comments.content: It’s supposed to be [Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201150602/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-avant-garde-gothic/), (also see the [alternates](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201150602/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner_flake/avant_garde_gothic_alternate_ot/)), but this looks kinda like a cheap knockoff.

... aka Century Gothic. “AGENCY” might be a custom Avant Garde.

- Lex
